flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to get an oil change every 3000/1000 = <<3000/1000=3>>3 months
So he gets 12/3 = <<12/3=4>>4 oil changes a year
That means he pays for 4-1 = <<4-1=3>>3 oil changes a year
So he pays 3*$50 = $<<3*50=510>>510 a year
#### 510

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
